mapper.select: SELECT u.*, p.permission_name FROM quiz.t_user AS u left join quiz.t_user_roles AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id left JOIN quiz.t_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id left JOIN quiz.t_role_permissions AS rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id left JOIN quiz.t_permission AS p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.username = #{account} or u.mail = #{account} or u.phone = #{account}
select u.* from quiz.t_user_auth tua left join quiz.t_user u on tua.user_id = u.user_id where tua.provider_id = #{providerId}

select c.*, sum(b.score) as total_score from quiz.q_paper a left join quiz.q_answers b on a.paper_id = b.paper_id left join quiz.t_user c on b.responder_user_id = c.user_id
where a.state != -1 and a.creator_user_id = #{userId} and b.responder_user_id is not null group by c.user_id order by total_score desc;

select us.* from quiz.q_paper a left join quiz.q_answers b on a.paper_id = b.paper_id left join quiz.t_user us on a.creator_user_id = us.user_id where a.state != -1 and a.creator_user_id = #{userId} and b.score = 100 group by us.user_id

select a.*, count(distinct b.paper_id) as paper_total, count(distinct c.answer_id) as answers_total, count(distinct d.responder_user_id) as intimate_friend_total from quiz.t_user a left join quiz.q_paper b on a.user_id = b.creator_user_id # 我的出题 left join quiz.q_answers c on a.user_id = c.responder_user_id # 我的答题 left join quiz.q_answers d on b.paper_id = d.paper_id and d.score = 100 # 做我的试卷,得分100分的 where a.user_id = #{userId} group by a.user_id
